committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals to commemorate Elizabeth Pole.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to strike and sell commemorative silver medals in honor of Elizabeth Pole, founder of Taunton, Massachusetts.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals to commemorate Elizabeth Pole.
